title: European responses to post WWII problems

content.question: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes.Analyze the common political and economic problems facing Western European nations in the period 1945-1960 and discuss their responses to these problems.

frqParts.text: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes.Analyze the common political and economic problems facing Western European nations in the period 1945-1960 and discuss their responses to these problems.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
